text: midneunjadeul-iyeo neohui gaunde mid-eum-eul baebanhanja issdamyeon hananim i geudeul-eul salanghasigo geudeul-eun geu bun-eul salanghamyeo midneun jadeul-ege gyeom sonhago bulsinjadeul-egeneun ganghamyeo hananim-ui gil-eseo seongjeonhago eotteon bi bangjaui heomdamdo dulyeowohaji anhneun baegseong-eul oge hasinila geugeos-i ba lo geubun-ui tteus-e ttala buyeohasin hananim-ui eunhyela hananim-eun jihyelo chungmanhasinila
